answer:
QUESTION
Do the washing machines that we have at our houses make our clothes paak. since I have some problems which make my clothes dirty frequently it gets hard for me to wash my clothes three times each. The machines go through 3 cycles and rinse the clothes after each cycle. (the dirt that gets on my clothes do to some problmes that I have are mani,madhi and urine)

JazakAllah

ANSWER


Share:

The clothes washed in a domestic washing machine becomes pure and clean.
